title: Female night shift workers may have increased risk of common cancers

title_detail.value: Female night shift workers may have increased risk of common cancers

summary: Night shift work was associated with women having an increased risk of breast, skin, and gastrointestinal cancer, according to a meta-analysis.

summary_detail.value: Night shift work was associated with women having an increased risk of breast, skin, and gastrointestinal cancer, according to a meta-analysis.
